## Read in dataset
```{r}
cdi = read_csv("./cdi.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
cdi
```

```{r}
## no missing value
cdi %>% 
  select(everything()) %>%  
  summarise_all(funs(sum(is.na(.))))
```
